00008 void ORVBasicADCDecoder::Swap(UInt_t* record)
00009 {
00010   if (IsShort(record)) return;
00011   
00012   /* Swap so we can tell if this is a single or double word timestamp.*/
00013   /*
00014   ORUtils::Swap(record[1]); 
00015   size_t startSwapFrom = 4;
00016   ORUtils::Swap(record[2]);
00017   ORUtils::Swap(record[3]);
00018   UInt_t dummy = record[2];
00019   record[2] = record[3];
00020   record[3] = dummy;*/
00021   for (size_t i=1;i<LengthOf(record);i++) {
00022     ORUtils::Swap(record[i]);
00023   }
00024 }
00025 double ORVBasicADCDecoder::ReferenceDateOf(UInt_t* record)
00026 { 
00027   if(IsShort(record)) return 0.0;
00028   if(LengthOf(record) != 4) return 0.0;
00029 
00030   double refDate = (*((double*)(record+2)));
00031   return refDate;
00032 }

00034 
00035 std::string ORVBasicADCDecoder::GetHistName(int iHist)
00036 {
00037   const int kNCards = 0x1f+1;
00038   const int kNChannels = 0xf+1;
00039 
00040   int iChannel = iHist % kNChannels;
00041   iHist = (iHist - iChannel) / kNChannels;
00042 
00043   int iCard = iHist % kNCards;
00044   int iCrate = (iHist - kNCards) / kNCards;
00045 
00046   return ::Form("h%s_%d_%d_%d", GetLabel().c_str(), iCrate, iCard, iChannel);
00047 }
00048 
00049 std::string ORVBasicADCDecoder::GetHistTitle(int iHist)
00050 {
00051   const int kNCards = 0x1f+1;
00052   const int kNChannels = 0xf+1;
00053 
00054   int iChannel = iHist % kNChannels;
00055   iHist = (iHist - iChannel) / kNChannels;
00056 
00057   int iCard = iHist % kNCards;
00058   int iCrate = (iHist - kNCards) / kNCards;
00059 
00060   return ::Form("%s: Crate %d, Card %d, Channel %d", GetLabel().c_str(), iCrate, iCard, iChannel);
00061 }
00062 
00063 int ORVBasicADCDecoder::GetHistIndex(UInt_t* record)
00064 {
00065   const int kNCards = 0x1f+1;
00066   const int kNChannels = 0xf+1;
00067 
00068   return int(ChannelOf(record)) + kNChannels*CardOf(record) + kNChannels*kNCards*CrateOf(record);
00069 }
00070 
00071 std::string ORVBasicADCDecoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00072 {
00073   switch(iPar) {
00074     case 0: return "crate";
00075     case 1: return "card";
00076     case 2: return "channel";
00077     case 3: return "adc";
00078     default:
00079       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00080                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00081       return "unknown";
00082   }
00083 }
00084 
00085 UInt_t ORVBasicADCDecoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/)
00086 {
00087   switch(iPar) {
00088     case 0: return CrateOf(record);
00089     case 1: return CardOf(record);
00090     case 2: return ChannelOf(record);
00091     case 3: return ADCValueOf(record);
00092     default:
00093       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetPar(): index (" << iPar
00094                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00095       return 0;
00096   }
00097 }
